reviews.content: On iOS 11.4.1 and even on iOS 12.1.4 TypeStatus 2 worked great. Still works on my iP8, iOS 12.4 but after rebooting have to use terminal and type “killall imagent” to allow contact typing StBar notifications again.
Currently a bug that should be fixed on the next update. There is a delay on the first letter typed in messages app.
Causes lots of crashes, but mainly with “imagent” (whatever that is.)
Needs to be updated for arm64 devices
Not working for iphone xs ios 12.0
